nodes.text: Loonoo, also known as Honest Loonoo, was a criminal fixer and con artist who lived on Nar Shaddaa. He worked as second in command to Gallandro. He assisted in the theft of the Codeleach from the Varcinius Repository, but abandoned his former crew shortly after.

After a string of failed scams and con shortages, Loonoo ended up without enough credits to pay for decent food for himself and his five pet rib-cats. He was scammed by a supposed former Jedi Padawan, who sold him a fake elixir to cure him of his neck pains.

Sometime later, Loonoo finally decided to leave Nar Shaddaa, convinced that he was being followed by criminals who wanted to steal  from him the infamous Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide that he in turn had stolen from his former boss. Before escaping the moon, Loonoo was mugged by Skrrll who stole the Smuggler's Guide from him.
